review: this is my favorite ac game by far i love the story and combat to this day and replay it every so often i do have to admit some nostalgia for enjoying it so much but it does really make me wonder how the heck did they manage to drop the ball so hard with more recent games i mean wow they came from this a game that belongs in my top 5 favorite games of all time to now creating games that i and probably many other people dont even bother watching the trailers for

assassins creed iv black flag  a pirates dream come true  one of the most fun and immersive assassins creed games ive ever played the naval combat openworld exploration and sea shanties make you feel like a pirate edward kenway is a badass protagonist with a great story arc whether youre looting ships diving for treasure or hunting templars it never gets old if you love pirates this is the gold standard  1010  raise the black flag and set sail
last update broke core features and ubisoft will not fix it  only buy if its really cheap as you cant complete it if it gets fixed ill change to a very positive review but right now it is broken
this has been my introduction to assassins creed and its been a lot of fun so far i like the mix of stealth and action im just beginning but its been fun
if you want to relax and play a very good game this is the one for you very nice mechanics good story line highly recommended

this game is awesome  however the pc port isnt exactly the best   on deck which i play exclusively on has sudden drops into the mid 40s sometimes lower which is surprising since this was a 360 and ps3 game  ubisoft connect sucks too every time i launch i have to reenter my password   in general ubisoft is a terrible company but this is still a great game just buy it on sale and do not buy it at full price
best assassins creed game ever made not even debatable
pas de steam cloud pas de sauvegarde ubisoft on est ou ici
love it ever sens it came out

jesus christ how hard is it to get this game actually running i need to put the compatibility mode into window 95 to get past the start up screen after that it runs at 16 fps lovely stuff ubisoft lovely stuff
pirate themed assassins creed is a great idea good story and graphics

one of the best pirate games ever but beware the following issues some missionsareas are sometimes a bit buggy requiring a restart of the game the physics for the ship and npcs is sometimes janky in a weird but sometimes funny way classic ubisoft the game may or may not run on modern systems check forums for guides on how to run old games on new machines
for those who like to sail open seas and love the ac franchise good story
see a pirate shoot a pirate be a pirate
one of my favorite games and the best assassins creed if you like naval combat and pirate game if you like pirates

back in 2014 this was the first game that i played on the new xbox i purchased and it introduced me to modern gaming with visuals that i never seen before while all i have played before it were 200456 games in 2017 i replayed it on my pc and achieved 100 completion and now because they added achievements im gonna replay the whole story which still sticks in my head

apparently people dislike this game since it diverges from the roots of the originals to a somewhat extreme degree but i loved this game maybe it is not indicative of the franchise at large but it is individually still a great game that i would recommend

de mis ac favoritos en cuestion de gameplay es mi top 3 la verdad el mejor aspecto es el de combate naval especialmente cuando mejoras tu barco al maximo nivel y eres basicamente indestructible el combate igual bastante intenso pero puedes abusar de el para acabar con varios enemigos a la vez recomendado desactivar por completo las opciones physx ya sean de nvidia o amd ya que son controladores viejos y ya no tienen soporte
booted this game up in the morning and shortly after the sun went down 1010 would lose an entire day again
best singleplayer game  story 1010       graphics for its time 910         movement 810         grind 1010                        its just fun to roam around cuba as edward kenway 100 recommended
it is very immersive enjoyable and awesome
one of the best acsgames  gameplay char development friendship emotional fighting stealth pirates  i almost cried when edward caught a glimpse of his dead friends gathered together
the gameplay is great for what it is but the story makes no sense if you want piracy with lore this is the game for you

i keep on coming back to this game and i keep liking it with the aveline and freedom cry dlc in the bundle this is definitely a great game loved it from the day it launched the only thing i dont necessarily like about the game is the multiplayer and i never played it for more than maybe an hour sad to see you needed to play the multiplayer to get all the achievements otherwise great game love the gameplay the visuals the story and the characters
this game is a masterpiece in a world without gold we might have been heroes
one of the greatest assassin creed games created find myself venturing back to this game after all these years definitely recommend to others as this is a game that never loses taste or interest
the ac game i had the most fun playing and would play over and over again

such a good and classic assassins creed game i really wanted cloud saving feature in this game cuz i literally had to start a new game after reinstalling the windows plus it has a 60 fps cap which really sucks but overall it is one of my most fav ac game of all time
gem era of ac franchise hoping on the best for the remake
best assassins creed game by far

incredible game before pirates were good now pirates are incredible this game makes me wanna visit nassau and the bahamas combat brutality feels superb ship combat feels massive story is engaging and the historical accuracy is astoundingly good the music and atmosphere of this game are beyond extraordinary sailing across the atlantic in the starry night singing sea shanties and whilst keeping a lookout for spanish ships to rob is just a perfect vibe

most probably the best game i have every play overall if you havent played give it a try
